source_objects.title: Sales
source_objects.description: Improve your sales skills with courses on sales promotion, mastering sales calls, mastering sales meetings, sales persuasion skills, cold calling skills, closing sales and more.

items.title: Closing Sales - Business by Design
items.headline: Learn a System that Puts You in Control…  Start Stacking The Odds In Your Favor, Make it Happen On Purpose - Every-time!
objectives_summary: The single biggest thing that separates amateurs from professions is their willingness to look at ideas maybe in a new way and then the ability to take action! – what we will be coaching to is a system you can drop into your business to start getting specific results on purpose.

Learn the why traditional sales methods just don’t work. How to separate yourself from the competition on such a way that builds credibility and identifies you as the professional they need to work with.
Get the inside stuff no one else gets. Learn new ways to get your call returned and stay in control of what happens next.

items.title: Business Development Executive Coaching 4 Cold Calling Sales
items.headline: Business Development Executive Coaching - Lead Generation Business, Cold Calling & Sales Pitching
objectives_summary: The key objective of this Course is Lead Generation Business Development Success and Sales
At the end of this Executive Coaching Course you will be able to run a full Business Development and Lead Generation team or conduct Business Development on your own
Growth Hacking your Sales by setting Priorities and Objectives for your Sales and Marketing Strategy

items.title: Business Development Masterclass™ - Business Growth Secrets
items.headline: Learn business development strategies for making business deals & business partnerships. A-Z business development guide.
objectives_summary: Understand the core concepts of business development
Build a practical business development strategy
Create and implement a growth-enhancing strategies

items.title: Sales: Top 10 Sales Secrets of a Successful Salesperson
items.headline: Learn effective sales strategies and enjoy different training (case studies, animations, assignments and quick support)
objectives_summary: Develop effective traits of a salesperson
Understand your customer better and what they
Represent your product/service better

items.title: Become an Expert Recruiter and Top Biller - 360° Essentials
items.headline: Apply key principles of the recruitment cycle, enabling you to generate business, secure deals and become a top biller!
objectives_summary: Understand and be able to apply the core principles of the full recruitment life cycle, from initial lead generation to closing multiple, successive deals
Construct a detailed analysis of the Consultant’s market and Client’s needs to build candidate and client control
Locate and source high quality, passive candidates, who are difficult to find

items.title: The Complete CRM Course for Beginners
items.headline: Learn Customer Relationship Management, Types, Customer Relationships, Customer Management, Implementation & more
objectives_summary: Students will be able to Learn Customer Relationship Management
Students will be able to Learn Types of CRM
Students will be able to Learn Customer Relationships

items.headline: Learn how to sell gift cards on eBay: where to find them, which ones to sell, and how to list them.

Researching the value of giftcards
Where to get additional giftcards

objectives_summary: What is KAM (Key Account Management) about
What do you need to implement KAM (Key Account Management)

items.title: International Trade 101
items.headline: Physical Trade :- Import, Export & Cross Trade. Logistics, Incoterms, Trade Documentations, HS Code and much more....
objectives_summary: How to trade in an International Market.
How to be a Successful Trader.
How to overcome the operational challenges in physical International Trade.

items.title: Sales - Close More Sales Faster with these Pro Moves
items.headline: Making the Right Sales Moves at The Right Time...  Get the inside edge to separate yourself from the competition.
objectives_summary: Get the inside stuff no one else gets. Learn new ways to get your call returned and stay in control of what happens next.

Learn the why traditional sales methods just don’t work. How to separate yourself from the competition on such a way that builds credibility and identifies you as the professional they need to work with.

The single biggest thing that separates amateurs from professions is their willingness to look at ideas maybe in a new way and then the ability to take action! – what we will be coaching to is a system you can drop into your business to start getting specific results on purpose.

items.title: Sales Skills Mastery 2:  The Ultimate Sales Shortcuts
items.headline: 20 Persuasion Hacks to Close Sales Faster - Sales Techniques and Strategies For Reluctant Buyers
objectives_summary: SELL the way your prospects actually buy...not the way they say they buy
TURN prospect interest into a buyer's commitment
INFLUENCE your prospect's even when you're not around

items.title: Foundations of Awesome Customer Service
items.headline: Learn to develop outstanding customer service for your business or as an individual
objectives_summary: Learn techniques of effective communication and customer contact
Gain knowledge about new trends in customer service
Learn the fundamentals of outstanding customer service

items.title: B2B Lead Generation via Personalised Sales Videos & LinkedIn
items.headline: Wonder Leads: Outbound sales for positive businesses that's proved to be nearly 20x more effective than cold calling
objectives_summary: You'll learn a PROVEN method of generating leads using personalised videos and LinkedIn.
How to film, edit and share a personalised video that kickstarts PROFITABLE sales conversations.
The tools and techniques to SUCCEED at outbound B2B sales without sacrificing time, money or integrity.

Feel comfortable "selling" without sounding or feeling "salesy"

objectives_summary: The difference between startup and ongoing expenses
